channel.title: [PI] ActionHandler [PI]

item.title: [PI] ActionHandler [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

[quote=“SacredHeart, post:18, topic:407292”][quote author=sp11k3t3ht3rd link=topic=508576.msg3692323#msg3692323 date=1312207064]

case 2406: if (c.inStaffArea() && c.playerRights <= 1) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(3226, 3219, 0); c.sendMessage("You've been declined access to here, you've been teleported to lumbridge."); } else { //c.getPA().spellTeleport(,,,); c.sendMessage("You arrive at staff zone, don't leak any information."); } break;

Use that. You were checking if the players rights were above 1 which includes staff. That’s why it was teleporting you to lumbridge. Use the code above which checks for if the player rights are less than 1 (not staff). Change the number as needed because I don’t do private servers so I don’t know what the numbers for player rights are anymore.
[/quote]
That doesn’t work for some reason, Why is PI fucking with me?[/quote]

Just add me on Msn I’ll do it real quick. - Kmunoz789@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ActionHandler [PI]
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

[quote=“sp11k3t3ht3rd, post:17, topic:407292”]case 2406: if (c.inStaffArea() && c.playerRights <= 1) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(3226, 3219, 0); c.sendMessage("You've been declined access to here, you've been teleported to lumbridge."); } else { //c.getPA().spellTeleport(,,,); c.sendMessage("You arrive at staff zone, don't leak any information."); } break;

Use that. You were checking if the players rights were above 1 which includes staff. That’s why it was teleporting you to lumbridge. Use the code above which checks for if the player rights are less than 1 (not staff). Change the number as needed because I don’t do private servers so I don’t know what the numbers for player rights are anymore.[/quote]
That doesn’t work for some reason, Why is PI fucking with me?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ActionHandler [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sp11k3t3ht3rd sp11k3t3ht3rd
item.description:
@sp11k3t3ht3rd wrote:

case 2406: if (c.inStaffArea() && c.playerRights <= 1) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(3226, 3219, 0); c.sendMessage("You've been declined access to here, you've been teleported to lumbridge."); } else { //c.getPA().spellTeleport(,,,); c.sendMessage("You arrive at staff zone, don't leak any information."); } break;

Use that. You were checking if the players rights were above 1 which includes staff. That’s why it was teleporting you to lumbridge. Use the code above which checks for if the player rights are less than 1 (not staff). Change the number as needed because I don’t do private servers so I don’t know what the numbers for player rights are anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ActionHandler [PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:5, topic:407292”][quote author=Anc13ntsIsBack link=topic=508576.msg3692128#msg3692128 date=1312187742]
In the code, you’re making it
If the player is in the Staff Area, and if their player rights is Higher than or equal to 1, it teleports them… and sends the message?

[code]
case 2406:
if (c.playerRights > 1) {
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3226, 3219, 0); //Staff Area Coordinates
c.sendMessage(“You’ve been teleported to the staff area, don’t leak information please”);
} else {

// c.getPA().spellTeleport(xcoord, ycoord, 0); // The coords you want them to be teleported to when declined. (commented out)
c.sendMessage(“You have been declined to enter the staff area, you’re not staff!”); //Regular Players who try to enter.
return;
}
break;[/code]

Moparscape is full of idiots. Everyone above did it wrong, if this doesn’t work let me know. Even though it should work…
[/quote]
Use this.

case 2406: if (c.inStaffArea() && c.playerRights >= 1) { //c.getPA().spellTeleport(,,,); c.sendMessage("You arrive at staff zone, don't leak any information."); } else { c.getPA().spellTeleport(3226, 3219, 0); c.sendMessage("You've been declined access to here, you've been teleported to lumbridge."); } break; [/quote]
Same exact case as mine, but you messed up because your checking if the player rights are above 1, what about mods? They don’t count as staff too?

Read full topic

In the code, you’re making it
If the player is in the Staff Area, and if their player rights is Higher than or equal to 1, it teleports them… and sends the message?

[code]
case 2406:
if (c.playerRights > 1) {
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3226, 3219, 0); //Staff Area Coordinates
c.sendMessage(“You’ve been teleported to the staff area, don’t leak information please”);
} else {

// c.getPA().spellTeleport(xcoord, ycoord, 0); // The coords you want them to be teleported to when declined. (commented out)
c.sendMessage(“You have been declined to enter the staff area, you’re not staff!”); //Regular Players who try to enter.

break;[/code]

Moparscape is full of idiots. Everyone above did it wrong, if this doesn’t work let me know. Even though it should work…
[/quote]
you fergot the staffarea bit and if you didnt see i putted if play rights are lower than 1-.-

case 2406: if (c.inStaffArea() && c.playerRights >= 0) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(3226, 3219, 0); c.sendMessage("You've been declined access to here, you've been teleported to lumbridge."); } else { //c.getPA().spellTeleport(,,,); c.sendMessage("You arrive at staff zone, don't leak any information."); } break;[/quote]

I didn’t add staff area for a reason, as its not needed…

No, you put
If the PlayerRights are greater than or equal to 0. Not Lower than 1… (This would allow anyone to go in.)
If you wanted it less than 1 it would be…

I made it so if anyone is over Player Rights 1 can enter, and whoever is under gets declined.

item.title: [PI] ActionHandler [PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“SacredHeart, post:1, topic:407292”]case 2406: if (c.inStaffArea() && c.playerRights >= 1) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(3226, 3219, 0); c.sendMessage("You've been declined access to here, you've been teleported to lumbridge."); } else { //c.getPA().spellTeleport(,,,); c.sendMessage("You arrive at staff zone, don't leak any information."); } break;
This is a custom code I’ve added to my ActionHandler, But it is letting non staff in for some reason.[/quote]
That code makes no sense at all.
Use this.

case 2406: if (c.inStaffArea() && c.playerRights >= 1) { //c.getPA().spellTeleport(,,,); c.sendMessage("You arrive at staff zone, don't leak any information."); } else { c.getPA().spellTeleport(3226, 3219, 0); c.sendMessage("You've been declined access to here, you've been teleported to lumbridge."); } break;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ActionHandler [PI]
item.dc:creator: @escalation escalation
item.description:
@escalation wrote:

[quote=“moh, post:3, topic:407292”] case 2406: if (c.inStaffArea() && c.playerRights < 1) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(3226, 3219, 0); c.sendMessage("You've been declined access to here, you've been teleported to lumbridge."); break;
Dont use the else, just use this:)[/quote]

Then the person teleporting will get the message “you’ve been declined access to here, you’ve been teleported to lumbridge.”


case 2406:
if (c.inStaffArea() && c.playerRights >= 1) {
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3226, 3219, 0);
c.sendMessage("You arrive at staff zone, don't leak any information.");
} else {
if (c.inStaffArea() && c.playerRights == 0) {
//c.getPA().spellTeleport(,,,);
c.sendMessage("You've been declined access to here, you've been teleported to lumbridge.");
}
break;

Try that. I’m sure there is an error or two, but just come back with the errors I have no way to compile this Lol.

Read full topic
